item.title: "member blabla has logged in"
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights == 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100"); } }

Maybe?

I fixed the errors.

And if you have 3 it’ll say "Owner MYUSERNAME has logged in, when they log in.
Annnd i don’t want that,
They don’t need owner right’s =]

item.title: "member blabla has logged in"
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Oh, replace that with this:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("****")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("****") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("***")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerIsMember == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerIsMember == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in"; } }

item.title: "member blabla has logged in"
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

So, i’m trying to delete the thing on my server where it says if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("****")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("****") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("***")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerIsMember == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Non-Member " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerIsMember == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } }
I don’t want it to say "fdahjkf has logged in.
But i do want it to say “Player has logged in”
Just without the member part.
Help???

Read full topic
